title: Women 's average age at first marriage in Italy 2018 , by region
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Average age in the y axis.
The Average age is appeared to be the highest at Month Aosta Valley and lowest at Month Calabria.
The highest Month Aosta Valley has 4.1 more Average age than the lowest Month Calabria.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average age for 20 number of Months.
The Average age is highest at Month Aosta Valley and lowest at Month Calabria.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Average age in the y axis.
The Average age is appeared to be the highest at Month Aosta Valley and lowest at Month Calabria.
The highest Month Aosta Valley has 4.1 more Average age than the lowest Month Calabria.
max_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Average age in each Month on the y axis.
The Average age is highest at Month Aosta Valley and lowest at Month Calabria.
The Average age of Month Calabria is 1.13% smaller than the maximum value at Aosta Valley.
The Month Aosta Valley has the highest Average age, followed by Liguria, and Sardinia. Down to the Month Calabria which is the lowest.
Over the past 20 Months, the Average age has declined.
Month Emilia-Romagna, Tuscany, and Sardinia share the same value 33.9.
The Month Calabria has 1.06 times less Average age than average.
The Average age is 657.1 if we add up values of all Months.
